name: The Daily Grind (meadjix)
description:
The daily grind is a challenging puzzle game about creating "daily" life loops. It's composed of 3 levels of increasing difficultly and unique mechanics are introduced when you move up to the next level.

Controls:

WASD or screen edges for the camera

Note that the leaderboard doesn't work in the web version. If you want to submit your score in the leaderboard, choose the PC version.
